message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $15,000 to you, and I'm sure we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a great opportunity for you, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can strike a deal!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement
